snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama brought together the leaders of Japan and South Korea on Tuesday for their first face-to-face talks, seeking to thaw chilly relations between two of Washington's closest Asian allies....

headline.print_headline: Obama Brings U.S. Allies South Korea and Japan Together for Talks
headline.main: Obama Brings U.S. Allies South Korea and Japan Together for Talks

lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama brought together the leaders of Japan and South Korea on Tuesday for their first face-to-face talks, seeking to thaw chilly relations between two of Washington's closest Asian allies.
